Eric_Ethridge:
{{short description|Canadian country singer}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Eric Ethridge | image = | caption = | image_size = | birth_date = | birth_name = | birth_place = | origin = [[Sarnia]], [[Ontario]], Canada | instrument = | genre = {{hlist|[[Country music|Country]]|[[country pop]]}} | occupation = Singer-songwriter | years_active = 2014–present | label = {{hlist|Red Dot|[[Anthem Records|Anthem]]}} | associated_acts = | website = {{URL|ericethridge.com/}} }} '''Eric Ethridge''' is a Canadian [[country pop]] singer and songwriter. He has released two albums ''[[Good with Me]]'' (2020) and ''Family First'' (2024), and has two gold-certified singles in Canada with "[[California (Wave song)|California]]" and "[[If You Met Me First]]".{{cite news|title=Sarnia's Eric Ethridge is on the road again|url=https://www.theobserver.ca/entertainment/local-arts/sarnias-eric-ethridge-is-on-the-road-again|first=Paul|last=Morden|work=The Observer|publisher=[[Postmedia Network]]|date=September 1, 2020|access-date=December 27, 2020}}{{cite certification|region=Canada|artist=Eric Ethridge|access-date=August 1, 2023}} ==Early life== Eric Ethridge was raised in [[Sarnia]], [[Ontario]] and played [[Canadian football|football]] as a [[defensive end]] at the [[University of Western Ontario]].{{cite news|title=Country Music Awards: Sarnia's Eric Ethridge wins Discovery Award|url=https://lfpress.com/2016/09/10/country-music-awards-sarnias-eric-ethridge-wins-discovery-award|work=The Observer|publisher=[[Postmedia Network]]|date=September 10, 2016|access-date=January 3, 2021}} Prior to pursuing a full-time career in music, Ethridge attended a chiropractic school in [[Toronto]] and worked as a chiropractor in Sarnia.{{cite news|title=Sarnia's Eric Ethridge signs record deal|url=https://www.theobserver.ca/entertainment/local-arts/sarnias-eric-ethridge-signs-record-deal|first=Paul|last=Morden|work=The Observer|publisher=[[Postmedia Network]]|date=November 30, 2018|access-date=January 3, 2021}} ==Career== ===Early career and self-titled EP=== In 2016, he won the [[Canadian Country Music Association]]'s Discovery Award. In July 2018, he released his self-titled debut EP ''Eric Ethridge''.{{cite news|title=Eric Ethridge enjoying a 'slow burn'|url=https://www.theobserver.ca/news/local-news/eric-ethridge-enjoying-a-slow-burn|first=Paul|last=Morden|work=The Sarnia Observer|publisher=[[Postmedia Network]]|date=July 6, 2018|access-date=December 29, 2020}} The single "Liquor's Callin' the Shots" reached the top 30 of Canadian country radio. In August 2018, he won the Grand Prize in the 2018 Unsigned Only Music Competition for his song "Girl On Fire".{{cite web |title=Canadian Country Artist Eric Ethridge Wins Prestigious Grand Prize in 2018 Unsigned Only Music Competition |url=https://www.prweb.com/releases/canadian_country_artist_eric_ethridge_wins_prestigious_grand_prize_in_2018_unsigned_only_music_competition/prweb15706776.htm |website=PR Web |date=August 23, 2018|access-date=January 3, 2021}} In November 2018, Ethridge signed a worldwide recording and publishing deal with ole, who placed him on their label, Red Dot.{{cite news|title=ole Signs Singer-Songwriter Eric Ethridge to Worldwide Recording and Publishing Deal|url=https://feldman-agency.com/post-216/ole-signs-singer-songwriter-eric-ethridge-to-worldwide-reco|work=The Feldman Agency|access-date=January 3, 2021}} Further singles from the EP included "Makin' Me Crazy", "[[California (Wave song)|California]]",{{cite web|url=http://frontporchmusic.ca/music/eric-ethridge-covers-california/|title=Eric Ethridge Covers "California" in New Single|last=Jenna|date=October 25, 2018|website=Front Porch Music|language=en-US|access-date=April 22, 2019}} and "[[If You Met Me First]]",{{cite magazine|title=Eric Ethridge Pines For What Could Have Been in 'If You Met Me First' Video: Exclusive|url=https://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/country/8510744/eric-ethridge-if-you-met-me-first-video|magazine=[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]|first=Annie|last=Reuter|date=May 9, 2019}} the latter two of which were certified Gold by [[Music Canada]].{{cite web|first=Brent|last=Lale|title=Local musician Eric Ethridge has two records reach 'gold' status|url=https://london.ctvnews.ca/local-musician-eric-ethridge-has-two-records-reach-gold-status-1.5250733|work=[[CTV News]] London|date=January 1, 2021}} ===2020-present: ''Good with Me''=== In February 2020, Ethridge released his debut US single "[[Dream Girl (Eric Ethridge song)|Dream Girl]]", co-written by [[Dan + Shay]].{{cite news|title=ERIC ETHRIDGE HEADS TO THE U.S. WITH NEW SINGLE, 'DREAM GIRL'|first=Drew|last=Pearce|url=https://www.soundslikenashville.com/music/eric-ethridge-dream-girl/|work=Sounds Like Nashville|date=December 28, 2020|access-date=December 10, 2020}}{{cite news|title=Eric Ethridge's 'Dream Girl' Becomes a Precious Memory in Dan + Shay-Penned Single [Exclusive Premiere]|first=Cillea|last=Houghton|url=https://tasteofcountry.com/eric-ethridges-dream-girl-dan-and-shay/|work=Taste of Country|date=February 20, 2020|access-date=January 5, 2021}} The track was then included on his April 2020 extended play ''Forever With You''.{{cite web|first=Alyssa|last=Croezen|title=Eric Ethridge Debuts 'Dream Girl' Music Video, Drops New EP 'Forever With You'|url=https://etcanada.com/news/631187/eric-ethridge-debuts-dream-girl-music-video-drops-new-ep-forever-with-you/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200428142932/https://etcanada.com/news/631187/eric-ethridge-debuts-dream-girl-music-video-drops-new-ep-forever-with-you/|url-status=dead|archive-date=April 28, 2020|work=[[Entertainment Tonight Canada|ET Canada]]|date=April 24, 2020}}{{cite news|title=Sarnia's Eric Ethridge is off the road but still making music|url=https://www.theobserver.ca/entertainment/local-arts/sarnias-eric-ethridge-is-off-the-road-but-still-making-music|first=Paul|last=Morden|work=The Sarnia Observer|publisher=[[Postmedia Network]]|date=April 17, 2020|access-date=January 3, 2021}} In August 2020, Ethridge released the single "Kiss Me Goodbye"{{Cite web|first=Nanci|last=Dagg|url=https://canadianbeats.ca/2020/08/28/eric-ethridge-releases-his-new-single-kiss-me-goodbye/|title=Eric Ethridge releases his new single, "Kiss Me Goodbye"|work=Canadian Beats Media|date=August 28, 2020|access-date=January 3, 2021}} On October 30, 2020, Ethridge released his debut full-length album ''[[Good with Me]]'' on [[Anthem Records]] (rebranded from Red Dot),{{Cite web|url=https://www.iheartradio.ca/purecountry/kingston/audio/eric-ethridge-and-his-new-album-good-with-me-1.13838751|title=Eric Ethridge and his NEW album 'Good with Me'|work=Pure Country 99|access-date=January 3, 2021}}{{Cite web|first=Kim|last=Hughes|url=https://www.partonandpearl.com/blog/album-review-eric-ethridge-good-with-me|title=Album Review: Eric Ethridge, Good with Me|work=Parton and Pearl|date=November 5, 2020|access-date=January 3, 2021}} which includes the singles "[[Dream Girl (Eric Ethridge song)|Dream Girl]]", "Kiss Me Goodbye",{{Cite web|first=Nanci|last=Dagg|url=https://canadianbeats.ca/2020/11/03/november-is-starting-off-to-be-a-great-one-for-eric-ethridge-with-the-release-of-his-new-album-good-with-me-and-his-current-single-kiss-me-goodbye-still-climbing-the-charts/|title=November is starting off to be a great one for Eric Ethridge with the release of his new album Good with Me and his current single "Kiss Me Goodbye" still climbing the charts|work=Canadian Beats Media|date=November 3, 2020|access-date=January 3, 2021}}{{Cite web|url=https://www.anthementertainment.com/news/good-with-me-the-new-album-from-ccma-award-nominated-country-artist-eric-ethridge-available-today-10-30/|title=ALBUM FROM CCMA AWARD NOMINATED COUNTRY ARTIST ERIC ETHRIDGE AVAILABLE TODAY (10/30)|work=[[Anthem Records|Anthem Entertainment]]|date=October 30, 2020|access-date=January 3, 2021}} and "Sad Songs".{{Cite web|first=Nanci|last=Dagg|url=https://canadianbeats.ca/2021/02/12/listen-to-eric-ethridges-new-single-sad-songs-to-be-captivated-by-the-distinctive-insight-it-delivers/|title=Listen to Eric Ethridge's new single "Sad Songs" to be captivated by the distinctive insight it delivers|work=Canadian Beats Media|date=February 12, 2021|access-date=February 14, 2021}} In 2022, Ethridge signed a management deal with Workshop Music Group and independently released the single "Made in Mexico".{{Cite web|url=https://frontporchmusic.ca/music/eric-ethridge-made-in-mexico/|title=Eric Ethridge Releases New Single "Made In Mexico" And Signs Management Deal With Workshop Music Group|first=Jenna|last=Weishar|date=October 5, 2022|work=Front Porch Music|access-date=February 6, 2023}} ==Personal life== Ethridge married fellow Canadian country singer-songwriter [[Kalsey Kulyk]] in December 2019.{{cite web|first=Leena|last=Tailor|title=Exclusive: Canadian Country Singers Eric Ethridge & Kalsey Kulyk Wed In 'Magical' Mexican Beach Ceremony|url=https://etcanada.com/news/553710/canadian-country-singers-eric-ethridge-kalsey-kulyk-wed-in-magical-mexican-beach-ceremony-exclusive/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20191228134132/https://etcanada.com/news/553710/canadian-country-singers-eric-ethridge-kalsey-kulyk-wed-in-magical-mexican-beach-ceremony-exclusive/|url-status=dead|archive-date=December 28, 2019|work=[[Entertainment Tonight Canada|ET Canada]]|date=December 6, 2019}} During the [[COVID-19 pandemic]], the couple moved from [[Nashville, Tennessee]] into a van and performed under the "Love on the Road" banner throughout Canada.{{cite web|first=Brent|last=Lale|title=Canadian country music duo adapts to pandemic by playing concerts on van's rooftop|url=https://london.ctvnews.ca/canadian-country-music-duo-adapts-to-pandemic-by-playing-concerts-on-van-s-rooftop-1.5126889|work=[[CTV News]] London|date=September 3, 2020}}{{cite web|first=Amanda|last=Young|title=Love On The Road: Check out what Kalsey Kulyk and Eric Ethridge are doing now|url=https://www.923country.com/2020/10/02/love-on-the-road-check-out-what-kalsey-kulyk-and-eric-ethridge-are-doing-now/|work=92.3 Country|publisher=[[Rogers Media]]|date=October 2, 2020}} In August 2021, Kulyk gave birth to the couple's first child, a son named Wilder, in [[Alberta]].{{cite web|url=https://etcanada.com/news/815360/exclusive-canadian-country-stars-eric-ethridge-kalsey-kulyk-share-stunning-portraits-of-angel-newborn-son-wilder/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210901043135/https://etcanada.com/news/815360/exclusive-canadian-country-stars-eric-ethridge-kalsey-kulyk-share-stunning-portraits-of-angel-newborn-son-wilder/|url-status=dead|archive-date=September 1, 2021|title=EXCLUSIVE: Canadian Country Stars Eric Ethridge & Kalsey Kulyk Share Stunning Portraits Of 'Angel' Newborn Son Wilder|first=Leena|last=Tailor|date=August 31, 2021|work=[[Entertainment
